Text: Footballheres the rest of the Gators home schedule and the Longhorns schedule for comparison Gators Longhorns Oct LSU Oklahoma in Dallas Oct Auburn at Colorado Nov South Carolina at Kansas Do you go to the game Oklahoma game in Dallas I went one year and it was a lot of fun So if you have any desire to do this swap let me know

Re Footballme I know about being swamped I was here until last night The homecoming game is a good choice Ill be going in on Thursday evening because Im planning to run in the mile Gator Gallop fun run on Friday morning The run is followed by the homecoming parade and then Gator Growl is Friday night Gator Growl is the largest student run pep rally in the country and they always have two or three nationally recognized comedians The game is Sat and then we could fly home on Sun on either the am that arrives at this is the flight I usually take even though it means getting up early on Sun or the that arrives at I usually fly in and out of Jacksonville Ive checked a number of flights today and you could fly in any time on Thurs or Fri and out on Sun for Not too bad Ill pick up the rental car costs and we can stay at my brothers college apt but it will work for a night or two Let me know what you want to do Ill probably book my flight today or tomorrow to get this cheap rate on PM To Kelly ukePower cc Subject Re Football Hi Kelly Sorry I havent gotten back to you sooner but have been swamped I am thinking the South Carolina game works However what does a flight to Florida cost I need to factor that in as well as I am planning on going to Spain in November and probably need to watch my I have been to several OU games in Dallas and it is actually more fun than the AM game because they split the stadium Texas OU It is pretty intense I am trying to get tickets to the game this year and will probably go Kelly OBrien ukee To nergycom cc Subject Football PM Okay heres the rest of the Gators home schedule and the Longhorns schedule for comparison Gators Longhorns Oct LSU Oklahoma in Dallas Oct Auburn at Colorado Nov South Carolina at Kansas Do you go to the game Oklahoma game in Dallas I went one year and it was a lot of fun So if you have any desire to do this swap let me know

man Havent talked to you in awhile Hope things are good David reminded me about the game the other day Are you still headed to Spain for Thanksgiving If so let me know when you want to get together and do the ticketmoney swap Ill be in Florida this weekend but should be home on weekends after that for awhile Or we can do it one week night if Im in town Unfortunately my travel schedule is not slowing down around the holidays like Id hoped I also have another favor to ask is there any chance you would go to our Christmas party with me on Dec if I go David will obviously be there too Im such a loser that Ive had to go by myself the last three years and thats such a drag Let me know if you think youd consider it

Reare so sweet Only a truly nice person would subject themselves to someone elses corporate Christmas party I promise to lose a few pounds before then so I can squeeze into this sexy little dress that I bought for my Tahoe trip so you wont be too embarassed to be seen with me David has preapproved it The party is at the Four Seasons Hotel on Lamar As for the UT tickets the only night Im in town before Friday is Wed night Are you around that night on PM To cc Subject Re Hey Yes I am still headed to Spain I am actually leaving on Friday so I need to get those tickets to you pretty soon Let me know what days you are in town this week The th works for me Where is the Duke party this year G uke energycom To cc Subject PM Hey man Havent talked to you in awhile Hope things are good David reminded me about the game the other day Are you still headed to Spain for Thanksgiving If so let me know when you want to get together and do the ticketmoney swap Ill be in Florida this weekend but should be home on weekends after that for awhile Or we can do it one week night if Im in town Unfortunately my travel schedule is not slowing down around the holidays like Id hoped I also have another favor to ask is there any chance you would go to our Christmas party with me on Dec if I go David will obviously be there too Im such a loser that Ive had to go by myself the last three years and thats such a drag Let me know if you think youd consider it

Reyou sure you want to go to that trouble I could just have you take them to work and give them to Shawna and then I could pick them up from her Im not sure that I trust the US Mail that much My address is W th St though if you prefer to go that route What do I owe you for them I can mail you a check if you want or I could send some money with Shawna Just let me know what you want to do Thanks on PM To cc Subject Re It would probably be easiest for me to mail them to you What is your address uke energycom To cc Subject Re PM You are so sweet Only a truly nice person would subject themselves to someone elses corporate Christmas party I promise to lose a few pounds before then so I can squeeze into this sexy little dress that I bought for my Tahoe trip so you wont be too embarassed to be seen with me David has preapproved it The party is at the Four Seasons Hotel on Lamar As for the UT tickets the only night Im in town before Friday is Wed night Are you around that night on PM To cc Subject Re Hey Yes I am still headed to Spain I am actually leaving on Friday so I need to get those tickets to you pretty soon Let me know what days you are in town this week The th works for me Where is the Duke party this year G uke energycom To cc Subject PM Hey man Havent talked to you in awhile Hope things are good David reminded me about the game the other day Are you still headed to Spain for Thanksgiving If so let me know when you want to get together and do the ticketmoney swap Ill be in Florida this weekend but should be home on weekends after that for awhile Or we can do it one week night if Im in town Unfortunately my travel schedule is not slowing down around the holidays like Id hoped I also have another favor to ask is there any chance you would go to our Christmas party with me on Dec if I go David will obviously be there too Im such a loser that Ive had to go by myself the last three years and thats such a drag Let me know if you think youd consider it
